title: The One Where Chandler Crosses A Line

questions.question: What does Chandler say he saw when he walked into the bathroom?
questions.correct_answer: Kathy naked
questions.explanation: Chandler mentions that seeing Kathy naked was like torture.

questions.question: What does Joey plan to do with Kathy and Casey?
options: Go on a double date with them
Have dinner with Kathy and then Casey
Have an early dinner with Casey and a late dinner with Kathy
Cancel plans with both of them
questions.correct_answer: Have an early dinner with Casey and a late dinner with Kathy
questions.explanation: Joey tells Chandler that he is having an early dinner with Casey and a late dinner with Kathy.

questions.question: What is Ross' musical talent like?
questions.correct_answer: Poor but enthusiastic
questions.explanation: Ross' music is described as not being good, but he is enthusiastic about playing.

questions.question: What does Phoebe think about Ross' music?
options: She loves it and finds it inspiring
She hates it and thinks it's terrible
She thinks it's okay but not great
questions.correct_answer: She loves it and finds it inspiring
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Ross that his music is inspiring and that she loves it.

questions.question: Why does Chandler kiss Kathy?
options: Because he has feelings for her
Because he wanted to hurt Joey
questions.correct_answer: Because he has feelings for her
questions.explanation: Chandler kisses Kathy because he has developed feelings for her.

questions.question: How does Joey react when he finds out Chandler kissed Kathy?
options: He is angry and feels betrayed
He is indifferent and doesn't care
He is surprised but not upset
questions.correct_answer: He is angry and feels betrayed
questions.explanation: Joey is angry and feels betrayed when he finds out that Chandler kissed Kathy.

questions.question: What does Ross reveal about his musical performance at the end?
options: That he was playing a new song
That he was playing a cover song
That he was playing badly on purpose
That he was playing his best
questions.correct_answer: That he was playing badly on purpose
questions.explanation: Ross reveals that he played his last song badly on purpose.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Joey when Joey finds out about the kiss?
options: That he is sorry and it was a mistake
That he is not sorry and it was not a mistake
That he did it to hurt Joey
That he did it because Kathy initiated it
questions.correct_answer: That he is sorry and it was a mistake
questions.explanation: Chandler apologizes to Joey and admits that kissing Kathy was a mistake.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe refuse to play her music after Ross?
options: Because she thinks her music is not as good as Ross'
Because she thinks Ross' music is too good
Because she is intimidated by Ross' talent
Because she thinks it would be like following The Beatles
questions.correct_answer: Because she thinks it would be like following The Beatles
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that playing after Ross would be like the bicycle-riding chimps following The Beatles.

questions.question: What does Joey say about the new furniture in the apartment?
options: That it's ugly and he doesn't like it
That it's okay but not great
questions.correct_answer: That Chandler bought it all
questions.explanation: Joey is surprised by the new furniture and asks Chandler if he bought it all.

questions.question: What does Kathy offer to do for Chandler?
questions.correct_answer: Cut his hair
questions.explanation: Kathy offers to cut Chandler's hair after he mentions that he had a haircut appointment that got canceled.

questions.question: What does Ross use to create his music?
questions.correct_answer: A keyboard
questions.explanation: Ross uses a keyboard to create his music.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman Joey gets a phone number from at Central Perk?
questions.correct_answer: Casey
questions.explanation: Joey gets a phone number from a woman named Casey at Central Perk.

questions.question: Why does Joey have to walk back to get transmission fluid?
options: Because he wanted to get some exercise
questions.correct_answer: Because his car broke down
questions.explanation: Joey's car breaks down, so he has to walk back to get transmission fluid.

questions.question: What does Chandler tell Joey when Joey asks him to put Kathy on the phone?
options: That Kathy is on her way
That Joey should talk to Kathy himself
questions.correct_answer: That Kathy is on her way
questions.explanation: Chandler tells Joey that Kathy will talk to him, but then Joey's time runs out on the payphone.

questions.question: What does Ross say his music is meant to be?
questions.correct_answer: Uplifting and inspiring
questions.explanation: Ross says that his music is meant to be uplifting and inspiring.

questions.question: What does Phoebe think about Ross' decision to stop playing music?
questions.correct_answer: That it's a bad idea
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Ross that she doesn't want him to stop playing music.

questions.question: What does Joey say about Chandler's feelings for Kathy?
questions.correct_answer: That he's angry with him
questions.explanation: Joey is angry with Chandler for having feelings for Kathy.

questions.question: What does Chandler buy for the apartment?
options: All of the above and more
questions.correct_answer: All of the above and more
questions.explanation: Chandler buys a lot of new furniture for the apartment, including a TV and other items.

questions.question: Why does Joey say the bread is tainted?
options: Because it's made with bad ingredients
Because it's associated with Chandler's betrayal
questions.correct_answer: Because it's associated with Chandler's betrayal
questions.explanation: Joey says that the bread is tainted because it's associated with Chandler's betrayal.
